description: Source file implementing the HttpClient class for performing HTTP download operations using libcurl, including file download with progress tracking and cleanup procedures.

classes.name: HttpClient
classes.description: A class providing HTTP file download capabilities using libcurl, with support for setting rate limits, progress tracking, and cleanup.

methods.name: HttpClient()
methods.description: Constructor initializing the curl handle and preparing the HTTP client.

methods.name: HttpClient::Status downloadFile(const std::string & url,const std::string & fileName,uint32_t rateLimit)
methods.description: Performs a file download from a specified URL, saving to the provided filename, with optional rate limiting, and returns a status.

methods.name: size_t progressCb(void * ptr,double dltotal,double dlnow,double ultotal,double ulnow)
methods.description: Callback function reporting download progress percentage and checking for cancel flags.

methods.name: size_t write_data(void * ptr,size_t size,size_t nmemb,FILE * stream)
methods.description: Callback function to write downloaded data into the specified file stream.

ctags.name: downloadFile
ctags.pattern: /^HttpClient::downloadFile(const std::string & url, const std::string & fileName, uint32_t rateLim/

ctags.name: progressCb
ctags.pattern: /^size_t HttpClient::progressCb(void *ptr, double dltotal, double dlnow, double ultotal, double ul/

ctags.name: write_data
ctags.pattern: /^size_t HttpClient::write_data(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, FILE *stream) {$/
